title: New free champion rotation: Aurelion Sol, Braum, Nocturne and more!

replies.body: When will{{champion:427}} be free to play???{{item:3070}} {{item:3649}}
Usually new champions go on free ro 2 weeks after they are released!

Will riot ever make champs lower then 6300 ip like 1350, 450 ect, it does take a while to buy 1 champ so was just wondering if they will ever lower prices of old champs or upcoming ones {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
i think they've lowered a few champs IP to 4800 like {{champion:126}} and {{champion:119}} , don't know about 1350 or 450 IP though
But still wish {{champion:55}}  was free to play again..
